sentences.en: A remote control device was used to detonate the bomb.
I was persuaded of the usefulness of his new device.
sentences.cn: 我相信了他的新装置的实用性.

sentences.cn: 允许孩子在下午有一个小时的自由支配时间

sentences.en: Players use a haptic device such as a joystick to control the game.
sentences.cn: 游戏者用游戏杆之类的触觉设备玩游戏。

sentences.en: Some clamps that had held the device together came undone.
sentences.cn: 用来将装置夹在一起的一些夹子松开了。

sentences.en: The built-in safety device compensates for a fall in water pressure.
sentences.cn: 该内置式安全装置在水压下降时能提供保护。

sentences.en: The device automatically disconnects the ignition when the engine is switched off.
sentences.cn: 当引擎关掉时，这个装置会自动切断点火开关。

sentences.en: The device can discriminate between the cancerous and the normal cells.
sentences.cn: 这台仪器可以辨别癌细胞和正常的细胞。

sentences.en: The device had been used operationally some months previously.
sentences.cn: 该设备几个月之前曾投入运行。

sentences.en: The device is fixed to a post.
sentences.cn: 这个装置被固定在杆子上。

sentences.en: The device is manually operated, using a simple handle.
sentences.cn: 一只普通的手柄就可以手动操作这个装置。

sentences.en: The device is not designed to transmit to satellites.
sentences.cn: 该设备不是为向卫星发送信号而设计的。

sentences.en: The device will be in production by the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 该装置将于年底投入生产.

sentences.en: This device helps make virtual reality a more usable and accessible technology.
sentences.cn: 这一装置有助于使虚拟现实成为更可用、更便利的技术。

sentences.en: This device is the offspring of his inventive mind.
sentences.cn: 这一装置是他那长于发明的头脑的产儿.
